title: Wellness Allowance & Vacation Calculator
sub-title: The Application calculates how many vacation days you will accumulate for your next vacation period. It will aslo calculate how much Wellness Allowance you can use during your first year of employment.
start-date-sub-title: The calculation is based on your start date

message.informationOnFuture: Comming years / vacation periods you will will be able to use your full number of vacation days and Wellness Allowance.
